Speaker: Hagoromo Otsutsuki
Text: There is a chain that began from creation, and continued through the Otsutsuki, never ceasing... People became shinobi, and created clans and villages. Even during peaceful interludes… the flames of war never died out, but grew ever stronger… along with hatred. And so, those two continued to late each other, fighting on and on. However… a single ninja… was able to sever that chain and cultivate a new future. He created best friends, followed them, challenged them, and connected them. His will… gradually came to encompass all shinobi, the world, and all its hatred… until it came to reveal a new path. Here, the handbook that encompasses everything about the way of the shinobi reaches its conclusion. It’s time to give that handbook a title… And so it will be named… The Tale of Naruto Uzumaki.
